feed.title: Category: Tours | Aberdeen Developers .Net User Group

entry.title: Gill Cleeren Tour
entry.content:
As some of you may know, Gill Cleeren is coming to do two talks in Aberdeen on the 24th November. Full details and registration for this event can be found here.

What you might not know is that Gill is actually doing 4 events in the UK. They break down as follows:

  • Monday 21st November: Liverpool

  • Tuesday 22nd November: Newcastle

  • Wednesday 23rd November: Edinburgh

  • Thursday 24th November: Aberdeen

If you don’t get a chance to see him in Aberdeen, you might be able to catch one of the other sessions.

entry.title: Caledonian Code Crusade Featuring Mark Rendle – #ADNUGUK
entry.content:
Hot on the heels of speaking at DDDNorth Mark Rendle (@markrendle) starts the first leg of his “Caledonian Code Crusade” tonight in Glasgow at 1900. The agenda for this Crusade is as follows:

  • October 10th - Glasgow

  • October 11th - Edinburgh

  • October 12th - Dundee

  • October 13th - Aberdeen

More information about the above tour can be found from the man himself in his blog post.

This tour is gratefully sponsored by our friends over at Devexpress and Dot Net Solutions. Thank you very much for your help and support!
